Instruction: Combine the paprika, cayenne pepper, onion powder, salt, white pepper, black pepper, thyme, basil, and oregano in a small bowl.
Season both sides of the salmon fillets with the spice mixture. Brush each side with 1/4 cup melted butter.
Cook the salmon in the skillet until brown on both sides.
I'm glad you're opting for a healthier choice, salmon is a great addition to any diet!
